<td align="left" valign="top" width="68%">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
times new roman">ITEM 4:&#160;&#160;SUBMISSION OF MATTERS TO A VOTE OF SECURITY 
HOLDERS</font></div>
</td>
<td valign="top" width="5%" style="TEXT-ALIGN: right">

</td>

<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Explanatory Note</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">Unless otherwise indicated or the context otherwise requires, 
all references below in this annual report on Form 10-K (&#8220;Report&#8221;) 
to the &#8220;Company&#8221;, &#8220;us&#8221;, &#8220;our&#8221; and 
&#8220;we&#8221; refer to TOA Distribution Systems Inc.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Cautionary Notice Regarding Forward Looking 
Statements</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">Our disclosure and analysis in this Report contain forward-
looking statements. Certain of the matters discussed concerning our operations, 
cash flows, financial position, economic performance and financial condition, 
including, in particular, future sales, product demand, competition and the 
effect of economic conditions include forward-looking statements within the 
meaning of section 27A of the Securities Act of 1933, referred to herein as the 
Securities Act, and Section 21E of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, referred
to herein as the &#8220;Exchange Act&#8221;.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">Statements that are predictive in nature, that depend upon or 
refer to future events or conditions or that include words such as 
&#8220;expects,&#8221; &#8220;anticipates,&#8221; &#8220;intends,&#8221; 
&#8220;plans,&#8221; &#8220;believes,&#8221; &#8220;estimates&#8221; and similar
expressions are forward-looking statements. Although we believe that these 
statements are based upon reasonable assumptions, including projections of 
orders, sales, operating margins, earnings, cash flow, research and development 
costs, working capital, capital expenditures, distribution channels, 
profitability, new products, adequacy of funds from operations and other 
projections, and statements expressing general optimism about future operating 
results, and non-historical information, they are subject to several risks and 
uncertainties, and therefore, we can give no assurance that these statements 
will be achieved.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">Readers are cautioned that our forward-looking statements are 
not guarantees of future performance and the actual results or developments may 
differ materially from the expectations expressed in the forward-looking 
statements.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">As for the forward-looking statements that relate to future 
financial results and other projections, actual results will be different due to
the inherent uncertainty of estimates, forecasts and projections and may be 
better or worse than projected. Given these uncertainties, you should not place 
any reliance on these forward-looking statements. These forward-looking 
statements also represent our estimates and assumptions only as of the date that
they were made. We expressly disclaim a duty to provide updates to these 
forward-looking statements, and the estimates and assumptions associated with 
them, after the date of this filing to reflect events or changes in 
circumstances or changes in expectations or the occurrence of anticipated 
events</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">We undertake no obligation to publicly update any forward-
looking statement, whether as a result of new information, future events or 
otherwise. You are advised, however, to consult any additional disclosures we 
make in our Form 10-K, Forms 10-Q and Forms 8-K reports to the SEC. Also note 
that we provide a cautionary discussion of risk and uncertainties under the 
caption "Risk Factors" in this report. These are factors that we think could 
cause our actual results to differ materially from expected results. Other 
factors besides those listed here could also adversely affect us. This 
discussion is provided as permitted by the Private Securities Litigation Reform 
Act of 1995.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">3</font></div>
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">PART I</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">ITEM 1: DESCRIPTION OF BUSINESS</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">COMPANY OVERVIEW</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">TOA Distribution Inc (formerly Skyhigh Resources, Inc) (the 
"Company") was incorporated in the State of Delaware on April 2, 2007 to engage 
in the acquisition, exploration and development of natural resource properties. 
We are a development stage Company with no revenues and a limited operating 
history. The principal executive offices are located at, 5700 University West
Blvd West, Suite 304, Albuquerque, NM 87106.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">On October 6, 2008 we filed an S-1 Registration Statement with 
the Securities and Exchange Commission to register 1,000,000 shares of common 
stock at $0.025 and we are able to sell all the underlying common stock thereby 
raising a total of $25,000.00.&#160;&#160;The S-1 Registration Statement became 
effective on March 25, 2009 and qualified 1,00,000 shares of the Company&#8217;s
common stock to be sold by June 30, 2009 in accordance with the requirements of 
Section 4(2) offering under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended and Rule 502 
promulgated thereunder. There were no underwriters for this offering. The 
offering was fully subscribed for and the Company raised cash, reduced loans 
payable and reduced accounts payable.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">In August 2009 the Company initiated a number of corporate 
changes, including 1), a name change to TOA Distribution Systems Inc, (formerly 
known as Skyhigh Resources Inc, 2) approved a 10 for 1 roll forward of its 
issued and outstanding common stock, 3), increased it authorized par value 
$0.001 common shares to 250,000,000 shares (formerly 50,000,000), and 4), 
authorized 10,000,000 par value $0.001 preferred shares.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">The Company resolved to change its corporate focus, moving from
mining and exploration into bottled drinking water distribution. On September 2,
2009 the Company entered into to a Sub-Distribution agreement with Taste of 
Aruba (US), Inc to distribute bottled water products produced in Aruba by Taste 
of Aruba-Premium Aruban Water.&#160;&#160;The water will be bottled in a 
patented biodegradable bottle that will completely break down in a landfill site
within five years.&#160;&#160;The territory in which the Company can distribute 
these products include the United States and all its territories and insular 
areas in the Caribbean and Pacific such as but not limited to Puerto Rico, U.S. 
Virgin Islands, Marshall Islands, and Guam, and all of Canada.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">In conjunction with this change of focus, the Company board of 
directors resolved to sell its two mining properties described as the Riverbend 
Property and the Surprise Claims. We concluded the sale of these two claims in 
May 2012.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">As of the date of this 10-K filing we have not had any revenues
and had not begun operations. We have a Sub-Distribution agreement with Taste of
Aruba (US), Inc to distribute bottled water products.&#160;&#160;Our Company has
no employees at the present time with the general administration being performed
at no cost by a Com[any shareholder. We do not expect to commence earning 
revenues for the foreseeable future.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">There is no market for our shares, as we have not yet filed a 
15c211 to request a trading symbol on the OTC-BB. We anticipated that we will 
file for our trading symbol in 2013. We currently have no stock in the public 
float. Investors should be aware their investment in our securities is not 
liquid; there is the probability they will be unable to sell their shares and 
their investment will be lost.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">4</font></div>
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">BANKRUPTCY OR SIMILAR PROCEEDINGS</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">We have not been the subject of a bankruptcy, receivership or 
similar proceedings.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">PRODUCTS AND SERVICES</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">We do not currently have any products or services available for
sale&#160;&#160;pending completion of a water bottling plant by Taste of 
Aruba&#160;&#160;and we have no other product or service planned or announced to
the public. As a result, we have no customers or consumers of our products and 
we have no principal suppliers or sources for raw 
materials.&#160;&#160;&#160;Government approval&#160;&#160;if and as required 
will be provided by Taste of Aruba during their production of the bottled water 
products.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">MARKETS AND CUSTOMERS</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">We are in the pre development stage and presently have no 
operating assets or customers.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">COMPETITION</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">There are many competitors in the bottled water industry. 
However, to our knowledge we are unaware of any that offer a biodegradable 
plastic bottle. Our bottle will completely break down in a landfill site with 
five years. We expect competition to become increasingly intensified in the 
future and there is no assurance that we can keep pace with the intense 
competition in this market. Many of our competitors have significantly greater 
brand recognition, customer bases, operating histories and financial and other 
resources. In addition, many companies have expanded the size of their 
operations by acquiring other complementary companies to form advantageous 
strategic alliances. Many of our competitors offer less effective but similar 
services at less cost than us and have the financial resources to create more 
attractive pricing.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">GOVERNMENT REGULATION OR OTHER LEGAL UNCERTAINTIES MAY INCREASE
COSTS AND OUR BUSINESS WILL BE NEGATIVELY AFFECTED.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT:
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">We will be required to comply with many governmental 
regulations, although our supplier, Taste of Aruba will have the ultimate 
responsibility for the production and therefore the quality of the finished 
product. Our responsibility will apply to the education of our sales agents in 
the correct storage and distribution where to the best of our knowledge there 
are limited regulations.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">ENVIRONMENTAL CONTROLS COULD CURTAIL OR DELAY THE SALE AND 
DISTRIBUTION OF THE PRODUCT AND IMACT OUR COSTS..</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">Our product is water that we purchase as a finished product, 
therefore we foresee no environmental concerns in that regard. The bottle in 
which the water is package is unique in the industry as it is biodegradable and 
will completely break down in a landfill site within five years</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">EMPLOYEES</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">Corporate Office</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">We currently have no employees. We use a related party-
shareholder for bookkeeping services. Corporate Administrative and Chief 
Financial Officer duties are performed by our President and Director Andy 
Ruppanner.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">There are no formal employment agreements between the Company 
and our current <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">executive 
officer</font>.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>

<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT EXPENDITURES</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">We have not incurred any research 
or&#160;&#160;development&#160;&#160;expenditures&#160;&#160;since&#160;&#160;ou
r incorporation.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">PATENTS AND TRADEMARKS</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">We have no current plans for any registrations such as patents,
trademarks, copyrights, franchises, concessions, royalty agreements or labor 
contracts. We will assess the need for any copyright, trademark or patent 
applications on an ongoing basis.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">RISK FACTORS</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">RISKS RELATED TO OUR BUSINESS</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">WE ARE A DEVELOPMENT STAGE COMPANY WITH NO OPERATING HISTORY IN
THE BUSINESS OF BOTTLED WATER DISTRIBUTION.&#160;&#160;ACCORDINGLY, YOU WILL 
HAVE NO BASIS UPON WHICH TO EVALUATE OUR ABILITY TO ACHIEVE 
OUR&#160;&#160;BUSINESS OBJECTIVES.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">We&#160;&#160;are&#160;&#160;an&#160;&#160;development 
stage&#160;&#160;company&#160;&#160;and&#160;&#160;have&#160;&#160;no&#160;&#160
;current&#160;&#160;properties&#160;&#160;or operations therefore it is 
difficult for potential&#160;&#160;investors to evaluate our 
business.&#160;&#160;Our proposed 
operations&#160;&#160;are&#160;&#160;therefore&#160;&#160;&#160;subject&#160;&#1
60;to&#160;&#160;all&#160;&#160;of&#160;&#160;the&#160;&#160;risks&#160;&#160;in
herent&#160;&#160;in&#160;&#160;the establishment&#160;&#160;of a new 
business&#160;&#160;enterprise&#160;&#160;and must be considered in light of the
expenses,&#160;&#160;difficulties, complications and delays frequently 
encountered in connection&#160;&#160;with the formation of any new 
business,&#160;&#160;as well as those risks that are specific to the our 
industry.&#160;&#160;Investors should evaluate us in light of the 
delays,&#160;&#160;expenses,&#160;&#160;problems 
and&#160;&#160;uncertainties&#160;&#160;frequently&#160;&#160;encountered&#160;&
#160;by companies developing markets for new products, services and 
technologies. We may never overcome these obstacles.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">Our business is speculative and depends upon the implementation
of our business plan and our ability to enter into&#160;&#160;agreements with 
third parties for the distribution of our water product on terms that will be 
commercially viable for us.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">OUR PROBABLE LACK OF DIVERSIFICATION WILL INCREASE THE RISK OF 
AN INVESTMENT IN OUR COMPANY, AS OUR FINANCIAL&#160;&#160;CONDITION AND RESULTS 
OF OPERATIONS MAY&#160;&#160;DETERIORATE IF WE FAIL TO DIVERSIFY.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">Our business will focus on the bottled water distribution 
industry in a single or limited business 
locations.&#160;&#160;Larger&#160;&#160;companies have the ability to manage 
their risk by diversification. However, we will lack diversification, in terms 
of both the nature and geographic scope of our business.&#160;&#160;As a result,
we will likely be impacted more acutely by factors&#160;&#160;affecting our 
industry or the regions in which we operate than we would if our
business&#160;&#160;were more&#160;&#160;diversified,&#160;&#160;enhancing our 
risk profile. If we cannot diversify our operations, our financial condition and
results of operations could deteriorate.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">STRATEGIC RELATIONSHIPS UPON WHICH WE MAY RELY ARE SUBJECT TO 
CHANGE, WHICH MAY DIMINISH OUR ABILITY TO CONDUCT OUR OPERATIONS.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">Our ability to successfully 
identify&#160;&#160;and&#160;&#160;enter&#160;&#160;into 
commercial&#160;&#160;arrangements&#160;&#160;with&#160;&#160;customers&#160;&#1
60;will&#160;&#160;depend&#160;&#160;on our&#160;&#160;developing&#160;&#160;and
maintaining close working&#160;&#160;relationships&#160;&#160;with 
industry&#160;&#160;participants, our ability&#160;&#160;to 
select&#160;&#160;and&#160;&#160;evaluate&#160;&#160;suitable&#160;&#160;busines
ses into which we can place our products&#160;&#160;and to consummate 
transactions in a highly competitive environment. These realities are subject to
change and may impair our ability to grow.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">6</font></div>
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">To develop our 
business, we will endeavour to use the business&#160;&#160;relationships of our 
management to enter into strategic relationships, which may take the form of 
joint&#160;&#160;ventures with private&#160;&#160;parties 
and&#160;&#160;contractual&#160;&#160;arrangements&#160;&#160;with other 
distribution companies.&#160;&#160;We may not be able 
to&#160;&#160;establish&#160;&#160;these strategic relationships, or if 
established, we may not be able to maintain them. In addition,&#160;&#160;the 
dynamics of
our&#160;&#160;relationships&#160;&#160;with&#160;&#160;strategic&#160;&#160;par
tners may require us to incur expenses or undertake&#160;&#160;activities we 
would not otherwise be inclined to in order to fulfil our obligations to these 
partners or maintain our relationships. If our strategic relationships are not 
established or maintained, our&#160;&#160;business prospects&#160;&#160;may be 
limited,&#160;&#160;which could&#160;&#160;diminish&#160;&#160;our ability to 
conduct our operations</font>.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">WE MAY NOT BE ABLE 
TO&#160;&#160;EFFECTIVELY&#160;&#160;ESTABLISH&#160;&#160;DISTRIBUTION 
OPERATIONS&#160;&#160;OR MANAGE OUR GROWTH, WHICH MAY HARM OUR 
PROFITABILITY.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">Our strategy&#160;&#160;envisions&#160;&#160;establishing and 
expanding our water distribution business.&#160;&#160;If we fail to 
effectively&#160;&#160;establish distribution 
outlets&#160;&#160;and&#160;&#160;thereafter&#160;&#160;growth,&#160;&#160;our 
financial results could be adversely&#160;&#160;affected.&#160;&#160;Growth may 
place a strain on our management systems and resources.&#160;&#160;We must 
continue to refine and expand our business development 
capabilities,&#160;&#160;our systems and processes and our access 
to&#160;&#160;financing&#160;&#160;sources.&#160;&#160;As we grow,&#160;&#160;we
must&#160;&#160;continue&#160;&#160;to hire,&#160;&#160;train, 
supervise&#160;&#160;and manage new&#160;&#160;employees.&#160;&#160;We cannot 
assure you that we will be able to:</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;*&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;meet our
capital needs;</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;*&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;expand 
our systems effectively or efficiently or in a timely manner;</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;*&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;allocate
our human resources optimally;</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;*&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;identify
and hire qualified employees or retain valued employees; or</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>*&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;incorporate&
#160;&#160;effectively&#160;&#160;the&#160;&#160;components&#160;&#160;of any
business that we may acquire in our effort to achieve growth.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">If we are unable to manage our growth, our operations and our 
financial results could be 
adversely&#160;&#160;affected&#160;&#160;by&#160;&#160;inefficiency,&#160;&#160;
&#160;which&#160;&#160;could&#160;&#160;diminish&#160;&#160;our 
profitability.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">OUR BUSINESS MAY SUFFER IF WE DO NOT ATTRACT AND RETAIN 
TALENTED PERSONNEL.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">Our success will depend in large measure on the 
abilities,&#160;&#160;expertise, judgment, discretion&#160;&#160;integrity and 
good faith of our&#160;&#160;management&#160;&#160;and 
other&#160;&#160;personnel in conducting our 
intended&#160;&#160;business.&#160;&#160;We presently have a 
small&#160;&#160;management&#160;&#160;team, which we intend to expand in 
conjunction with our planned operations and growth. The loss of a 
key&#160;&#160;individual&#160;&#160;or our&#160;&#160;inability to 
attract&#160;&#160;suitably&#160;&#160;qualified staff could materially 
adversely impact our business.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">Our success&#160;&#160;depends on the ability of our management
and employees to interpret market and&#160;&#160;geographcal&#160;&#160;data 
correctly and to interpret and respond to economic, 
market&#160;&#160;and&#160;&#160;other&#160;&#160;conditions&#160;&#160;to&#160;
&#160;locate&#160;&#160;and&#160;&#160;adopt&#160;&#160;appropriate&#160;&#160;&
#160;investment 
opportunities,&#160;&#160;monitor&#160;&#160;such&#160;&#160;investments,&#160;&
#160;and&#160;&#160;ultimately,&#160;&#160;if&#160;&#160;required,&#160;&#160;to
successfully&#160;&#160;divest such 
investments.&#160;&#160;Further,&#160;&#160;no assurance can be given that our 
key personnel will continue their&#160;&#160;association or employment with us 
or that replacement&#160;&#160;personnel with comparable skills can be found. We
will seek to and will ensure that management and any key employees are 
appropriately compensated;&#160;&#160;however, their services cannot be 
guaranteed.&#160;&#160;If we are unable to attract and retain key personnel, our
business may be adversely affected.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">

<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">WE&#160;&#160;DO NOT 
HAVE&#160;&#160;EXTENSIVE&#160;&#160;EXPERIENCE&#160;&#160;IN&#160;&#160;PUBLIC&
#160;&#160;COMPANY MATTERS,&#160;&#160;WHICH COULD&#160;&#160;IMPAIR 
OUR&#160;&#160;ABILITY TO COMPLY&#160;&#160;WITH LEGAL AND&#160;&#160;REGULATORY
REQUIREMENTS.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">Our management team has had limited U.S. public company 
management experience or 
responsibilities,&#160;&#160;which&#160;&#160;could&#160;&#160;impair&#160;&#160
;our&#160;&#160;ability&#160;&#160;to comply&#160;&#160;with legal and 
regulatory&#160;&#160;requirements such as the&#160;&#160;Sarbanes-
Oxley&#160;&#160;Act of 2002 and applicable federal&#160;&#160;securities laws 
including filing required reports and other information required on a timely 
basis.&#160;&#160;There can be no assurance that our management&#160;&#160;will 
be able to implement and affect programs and policies in an effective and timely
manner that adequately&#160;&#160;responds to increased 
legal,&#160;&#160;regulatory&#160;&#160;compliance and 
reporting&#160;&#160;requirements&#160;&#160;imposed by such laws 
and&#160;&#160;regulations.&#160;&#160;Our&#160;&#160;failure 
to&#160;&#160;comply with such laws and regulations&#160;&#160;could lead to the
imposition of fines and penalties and further result in the deterioration of our
business.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">RISKS RELATED TO OUR FINANCIAL CONDITION</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Acquisition of 
distribution outlets, and future development and marketing activities, as well
as our administrative requirements (such as salaries, insurance expenses and 
general overhead expenses,&#160;&#160;(as well as legal compliance costs and 
accounting expenses) will require a substantial amount of additional capital and
cash</font> flow.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">We will require additional capital to continue to operate our 
business and our proposed operations.&#160;&#160;We may be unable to obtain 
additional capital as and when required. We may not be successful in locating 
suitable financing transactions in the time period required or at all, and we 
may not obtain the capital we require by other means. If we do not succeed in 
raising additional capital, the capital we have received to date may not be 
sufficient to fund our operations going forward without obtaining additional 
capital financing.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">We may not be successful in locating suitable financing 
transactions in the time period required or at all, and we may not obtain the 
capital we require by other means. If we do not succeed in raising 
additional&#160;&#160;capital,&#160;&#160;the capital we have received to date 
may not be&#160;&#160;sufficient&#160;&#160;to fund 
our&#160;&#160;operations&#160;&#160;going&#160;&#160;forward without obtaining 
additional capital financing.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New 
Roman">Any&#160;&#160;additional&#160;&#160;capital&#160;&#160;raised&#160;&#160
;through&#160;&#160;the sale of 
equity&#160;&#160;may&#160;&#160;dilute&#160;&#160;your 
ownership&#160;&#160;percentage.&#160;&#160;This could also&#160;&#160;result in
a decrease in the fair market value of our 
equity&#160;&#160;securities&#160;&#160;because&#160;&#160;our 
assets&#160;&#160;would be owned by a larger pool of 
outstanding&#160;&#160;equity.&#160;&#160;The terms of securities we issue in 
future capital transactions&#160;&#160;may be 
more&#160;&#160;favourable&#160;&#160;to 
our&#160;&#160;new&#160;&#160;investors,&#160;&#160;and may&#160;&#160;include 
preferences,&#160;&#160;superior&#160;&#160;voting&#160;&#160;rights and 
the&#160;&#160;issuance&#160;&#160;of&#160;&#160;warrants&#160;&#160;or other 
derivative&#160;&#160;securities,&#160;&#160;and issuances of incentive awards 
under equity employee incentive plans, which may have a further dilutive 
effect.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">Our ability to 
obtain&#160;&#160;needed&#160;&#160;financing&#160;&#160;may be impaired by such
factors as the capital markets, our status&#160;&#160;as a 
new&#160;&#160;enterprise&#160;&#160;without&#160;&#160;a&#160;&#160;demonstrate
d&#160;&#160;operating&#160;&#160;history (which will impact the amount of 
asset-based&#160;&#160;financing available to us) or the retention or loss of 
key&#160;&#160;management.&#160;&#160;If the amount of capital we are able to 
raise from&#160;&#160;financing&#160;&#160;activities&#160;&#160;is 
not&#160;&#160;sufficient&#160;&#160;to satisfy our capital needs, we may be 
required to cease our operations.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">8</font></div>
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">We may incur substantial costs in pursuing future 
capital&#160;&#160;financing,&#160;&#160;including investment banking fees, 
legal fees,&#160;&#160;accounting fees, securities law compliance 
fees,&#160;&#160;printing&#160;&#160;and&#160;&#160;distribution&#160;&#160;expe
nses&#160;&#160;and&#160;&#160;other&#160;&#160;costs.&#160;&#160;We may also be
required to recognize non-cash expenses in connection with certain securities we
may issue,&#160;&#160;such as convertible&#160;&#160;notes and 
warrants,&#160;&#160;which may adversely impact our cash</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">WE HAVE A HISTORY OF LOSSES AND AN ACCUMULATED DEFICIT AND 
EXPECT TO CONTINUE TO INCUR LOSSES UNTIL WE ESTABLISH PROFITABLE BUSINESS 
OPERATIONS.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">We incurred a net loss of $17,132 for the year ended March 31, 
2013. As at March 31, 2013 we had an accumulated deficit in the aggregate amount
of $174,647.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">OUR INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM HAS EXPRESSED
DOUBT OF OUR ABILITY TO CONTINUE&#160;&#160;AS GOING CONCERN. THIS COULD MAKE IT
MORE DIFFICULT FOR US TO RAISE FUNDS AND ADVERSELY AFFECT 
OUR&#160;&#160;RELATIONSHIPS&#160;&#160;WITH LENDERS,&#160;&#160;INVESTORS AND 
SUPPLIERS.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">Our independent registered 
public&#160;&#160;accounting&#160;&#160;firm,&#160;&#160;Seale &amp; Beers CPAs 
LLC,&#160;&#160;have added an explanatory paragraph to their audit opinion 
issued in connection with our consolidated financial statements for the period 
ended March 31, 2013&#160;&#160;with respect to their doubt about our ability to
continue. The Company has incurred operating losses since its inception in April
2007, and has&#160;&#160;an accumulated deficit of $174,647 at March 31, 2013, 
which together raises doubt about the Company&#8217;s ability to continue as a 
going concern. Our ability to continue as a going concern will be determined by 
our ability to sustain a successful level of operations and to continue to raise
capital from debt, equity and other sources. The accompanying consolidated 
financial statements do not include any adjustments that might result from the 
outcome of this uncertainty.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">RISKS RELATED TO OUR COMMON STOCK</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">NO MARKET CURRENTLY EXISTS FOR OUR SECURITIES AND WE CANNOT 
ASSURE YOU THAT SUCH A MARKET WILL EVER DEVELOP, OR IF DEVELOPED, WILL BE 
SUSTAINED.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">Our common stock is not currently eligible for trading on any 
stock exchange and there can be no assurance that our common stock will be 
listed on any stock exchange in the future. We intend to apply for listing on 
the OTC Bulletin Board trading system pursuant to Rule 15c211 of the Securities 
Exchange Act of 1934, but there can be no assurance we will obtain such a 
listing. The bulletin board tends to be highly illiquid, in part because there 
is no national quotation system by which potential investors can track the 
market price of shares except through information received or generated by a 
limited number of broker-dealers that make a market in particular stocks. There 
is a greater chance of market volatility for securities that trade on the 
bulletin board as opposed to a national exchange or quotation system. This 
volatility may be caused by a variety of factors, including: the lack of readily
available price quotations; the absence of consistent administrative supervision
of "bid" and "ask" quotations; lower trading volume; and general market 
conditions. If no market for our shares materializes, you may not be able to 
sell your shares or may have to sell your shares at a significantly lower
price.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
<div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">9</font></div>
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">IF OUR SHARES OF COMMON STOCK ARE ACTIVELY TRADED ON A PUBLIC 
MARKET, THEY WILL IN ALL LIKELIHOOD BE PENNY STOCKS.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">Broker-dealer practices in connection with transactions in 
&#8220;penny stocks&#8221; are regulated by certain penny stock rules adopted by
the SEC. Penny stocks generally are equity securities with a price per share of 
less than $5.00 (other than securities registered on certain national securities
exchanges or quoted on the NASDAQ Stock Market, provided that current price and 
volume information with respect to transactions in such securities is provided 
by the exchange or system). The penny stock rules require a broker-dealer, prior
to a transaction in a penny stock not otherwise exempt from the rules, to 
deliver a standardized risk disclosure document that provides information about 
penny stocks and the risks in the penny stock market. The broker-dealer must 
also provide the customer with current bid and offer quotations for the penny 
stock, the compensation of the broker-dealer and its salesperson in the 
transaction, and monthly account statements showing the market value of each 
penny stock held in the customer&#8217;s account. In addition, the penny stock 
rules generally require that prior to a transaction in a penny stock the broker-
dealer<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font>make a special
written determination that the penny stock is a suitable investment for the 
purchaser and receive the purchaser&#8217;s written agreement to the 
transaction. These disclosure requirements may have the effect of reducing the 
level of trading activity in the secondary market for a stock that becomes 
subject to the penny stock rules..</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">WE WILL INCUR ONGOING COSTS AND EXPENSES FOR SEC REPORTING AND 
COMPLIANCE WITHOUT REVENUE WE MAY NOT BE ABLE TO REMAIN IN COMPLIANCE, MAKING IT
DIFFICULT FOR INVESTORS TO SELL THEIR SHARES, IF AT ALL.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">We plan to contact&#160;&#160;a market maker to apply to have 
the shares quoted on the OTC Electronic Bulletin Board. To be eligible for 
quotation, issuers must remain current in their filings with the SEC. In order 
for us to remain in compliance we will require future revenues to cover the cost
of these filings, which could comprise a substantial portion of our available 
cash resources. If we are unable to generate sufficient<font style="DISPLAY: 
inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font>revenues to 
remain in compliance it may be difficult for you to resell any shares you may 
purchase, if at all.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">THE MARKET PRICE OF OUR COMMON STOCK IS LIKELY TO BE HIGHLY 
VOLATILE AND SUBJECT TO WIDE FLUCTUATIONS.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">Assuming we are able to establish an active trading market for 
our common stock, the market price of our common stock is likely to be highly 
volatile and could be subject to wide 
fluctuations&#160;&#160;in&#160;&#160;response&#160;&#160;to a number of 
factors&#160;&#160;that are beyond our control, including:</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">

align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">dilution&#160;&#160;caused by our issuance of 
additional&#160;&#160;shares of common stock 
and&#160;&#160;other&#160;&#160;forms of&#160;&#160;equity 
securities,&#160;&#160;which we&#160;&#160;expect to make in 
connection&#160;&#160;with future capital&#160;&#160;financings to fund our 
operations and growth,&#160;&#160;to attract and 
retain&#160;&#160;valuable&#160;&#160;personnel&#160;&#160;and in connection 
with future strategic partnerships with other companies;</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>

of capital in the capital markets; and</font></div>
</td>

<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">10</font></div>
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">These and other factors are largely beyond our 
control,&#160;&#160;and the impact of these risks, singly or in the aggregate, 
may result in material adverse changes to the market price of our 
common&#160;&#160;stock and our results 
of&#160;&#160;operations&#160;&#160;and&#160;&#160;financial 
condition.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">OUR OPERATING RESULTS MAY FLUCTUATE SIGNIFICANTLY, AND THESE 
FLUCTUATIONS MAY CAUSE OUR STOCK PRICE TO DECLINE.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">Assuming we are able to establish an active trading market for 
our common stock ,our operating results will likely vary in the future primarily
as the result of fluctuations in our revenues and operating expenses, expenses 
that we incur, the price of minerals in the commodities markets and other 
factors.&#160;&#160;If our results of operations do not meet 
the&#160;&#160;expectations&#160;&#160;of current or 
potential&#160;&#160;investors, the price of our common stock may 
decline.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">WE DO NOT EXPECT TO PAY DIVIDENDS IN THE FORESEEABLE 
FUTURE.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">We do not 
intend&#160;&#160;to&#160;&#160;declare&#160;&#160;dividends&#160;&#160;for&#160
;&#160;the&#160;&#160;foreseeable&#160;&#160;future,&#160;&#160;as we 
anticipate&#160;&#160;that we will&#160;&#160;reinvest any 
future&#160;&#160;earnings in the&#160;&#160;development&#160;&#160;and growth 
of our business.&#160;&#160;Therefore,&#160;&#160;investors will not receive any
funds unless they 
sell&#160;&#160;their&#160;&#160;common&#160;&#160;stock,&#160;&#160;and&#160;&#
160;stockholders&#160;&#160;may be unable to sell their shares on favourable 
terms or at all.&#160;&#160;Investors cannot be assured of a positive 
return&#160;&#160;on&#160;&#160;investment&#160;&#160;or that 
they&#160;&#160;will not lose the&#160;&#160;entire&#160;&#160;amount of their 
investment in the common stock.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">DISCLOSURE REGARDING FORWARD-LOOKING STATEMENTS</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">This Form 10-K&#160;&#160;contains&#160;&#160;forward-
looking&#160;&#160;statements&#160;&#160;that involve&#160;&#160;risks and 
uncertainties.&#160;&#160;We use words such as anticipate,&#160;&#160;believe, 
plan, expect, future, intend and similar expressions to identify such forward-
looking&#160;&#160;statements. You should not place too
much&#160;&#160;reliance&#160;&#160;on these&#160;&#160;forward-
looking&#160;&#160;statements.&#160;&#160;Our actual results are likely to 
differ&#160;&#160;materially from those&#160;&#160;anticipated in these forward-
looking statements for many reasons.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">ITEM 2: DESCRIPTION OF PROPERTY</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">We currently utilize space at the premises of Andy Ruppanner, 
an officer and director of the Company. The premises are located at 5700 
University West Blvd West, Suite 304, Albuquerque, NM 87106, formerly we were 
located at 1791 Marcy Lynn Court, San Jose, CA 95124. The facilities include an 
answering machine, a fax machine, computer and office equipment. We intend to 
use these facilities for the time being until we feel we have outgrown them. We 
currently have no investment policies as they pertain to real estate, real 
estate interests or real estate mortgages.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">ITEM 3: LEGAL PROCEEDINGS</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">The Company is not currently involved in any legal proceedings 
and management is not aware of any pending or potential legal 
actions.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">ITEM 4: SUBMISSION OF MATTERS TO A VOTE OF SECURITY 
HOLDERS</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">

0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:

<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">On August 3, 2009 at a Special Meeting of the shareholders 
where at a majority of the shareholders authorized the following changes to the 
Company&#8217;s Articles of Association and to its issued and outstanding 
shares.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>

</td>
<td>

</td>
</tr></table>

<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>

</td>

</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>

</td>

shares on a 10 for 1 basis.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">ITEM 5: MARKET FOR COMMON EQUITY AND RELATED STOCKHOLDER 
MATTERS</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">No market exists for our shares. We are not listed on any 
exchange.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">MARKET INFORMATION</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">The Company intends to make application to FINRA for the 
Company's shares to be quoted on the OTCBB. The Company's application to FINRA 
will consist of current corporate information, financial statements and other 
documents as required by Rule 15c211 of the Securities Exchange Act of 
1934.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">DIVIDENDS</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">There are no restrictions in our articles 
of&#160;&#160;incorporation&#160;&#160;or bylaws&#160;&#160;that prevent us from
declaring&#160;&#160;dividends.&#160;&#160;Delaware General Corporation Law, 
Chapter V, Section 170 however, do prohibit us from 
declaring&#160;&#160;dividends&#160;&#160;where,&#160;&#160;after&#160;&#160;giv
ing&#160;&#160;effect&#160;&#160;to&#160;&#160;the&#160;&#160;distribution of 
the dividend:</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">
<tr valign="top">
<td align="right" style="WIDTH: 45pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt;" face="Symbol, 
serif">&#183;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" 
align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">if&#160;&#160;the capital of the corporation, computed in 
accordance with Delaware General Corporation Law, shall have been diminished by 
depreciation in the value of its property, or by losses, or otherwise, to an 
amount less than the aggregate amount of the capital represented by the issued 
and outstanding stock of all classes having a preference upon the distribution 
of assets, the directors of such corporation shall not declare and pay out of 
such net profits any dividends upon any shares of any classes of its capital 
stock until the deficiency in the amount of capital represented by the issued 
and outstanding stock of all classes having a preference upon the distribution 
of assets shall have been repaired.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">ITEM 6: MANAGEMENT'S DISCUSSION AND ANALYSIS OR PLAN OF 
OPERATION</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">PLAN OF OPERATION</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">In an effort to make available the facilities of the public 
market to our funding requirements, the Company intends to make application to 
FINRA for the Company's shares to be quoted on the OTCBB. The Company's 
application to FINRA will consist of current corporate information, financial 
statements and other documents as required by Rule 15c211 of the Securities 
Exchange Act of 1934.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">12</font></div>
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">Subject to receiving adequate funding and the water product 
being available, to market the Taste of Aruba products we will selectively 
target various distribution outlets / locations such as airports, trade shows, 
exhibitions and other public activities which attract large gatherings of 
people.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">RESULTS OF OPERATIONS</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">Results of Operations for the Year Ended March 31, 2013 
compared to March 31, 2012.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">No sales or income was recorded for the year</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Operating Costs and 
Expenses</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">Total expenses incurred for the Year Ended March 31, 2013 
totalling $17,132 compared to $26,606, a reduction of $7,570 over the same 
period ending March 31, 2012.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">Office and Administration costs amounted to&#160;&#160;$15,096 
in the year ended March 31, 2013 compared to $22,666 during same period ended 
March 31, 2012. The reduction was made up primarily of lower mineral claims 
filing fees amounting to ($9,022), reduced office and bank charges amounting to 
($291) and reduced filing fees of ($259), off set by increased Stock Transfer 
fees amounting to $2002. In this period we sold our mineral clams and engaged a 
stock transfer company.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman">Interest expense for the Year Ended March 31, 2013 totalled 
$2,036, which was a reduction of $1,904 over the amount of $3,940 for the period
ended March 31, 2012. In the period ended March 31, 2013, we reduced our loans 
payable and the rate of interest on those loans.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
Times New Roman">SELECTED FINANCIAL INFORMATION</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><br>
